Title: Scrubs
Actors: Donald Faison, John C. McGinley, Ken Jenkins, Zach Braff
Plot: In the unreal world of Sacred Heart Hospital, intern John "J.D" Dorian learns the ways of medicine, friendship and life.
Language: English, German, Spanish, American Sign Language
Awards: Nominated for 3 Golden Globes. Another 19 wins & 67 nominations.
